resources.string: Received OTA configuration information, to confirm whether the installation and configuration
Checking for the latest software updates…
Please wait,this may take several minutes to complete.
This may take several minutes to complete.
A new software update is available.Do you want to download?
Are you sure you would like to cancel and stop the software download?
To begin installation,your phone needs to be restarted
There is a new system update package for your device, please confirm to download it.
Restart your phone to begin installation.
Mobile networks(This will generate more data traffic)
AutoUpdate: cancel update because it is busy
The update is currently busy,please wait…
Your phone doesn’t have enough storage space for update. Please free up some space and try again
"Your phone doesn’t have enough storage space for update. Please free up %1$s more space and try again. You can move some applications's data to T-card through Task Manager."
The network is unavailable,so application can not update
Device Management Crashed.Maybe Your phone doesn’t have enough space for this update.Please free up some space and try again
Restart your phone to begin installation
Please wait,it takes about %1$d seconds to complete
Please wait,it takes about %1$d minutes to complete
Please wait,it takes about %1$d hours to complete
Backing up your data,please don’t remove the SD card.
Downloading update package.Please don’t disconnect network.
Device is restoring up your data,please wait..
Please make sure the battery level is over 30% in order to finish installation.
Your software is up to date
Checking for the latest software updates
Current software is up to date!
Software updates not allowed when data roaming!

"You are currently roaming. Please check with Telstra as extra charges may occur.
Would you like to continue?"

"You are currently roaming. Please check with Telecom as extra charges may occur.
Would you like to continue?"
Software updates is not allowed when AirPlane mode.
No data services,Software updates are not allowed!

"Software updates are not available as data is not enabled.
Please check this service with your provider and the settings on the device."
When WiFi is connected, check for update automatically
When WiFi is connected, check for update automatically
When WiFi is connected to CMCC, check for update automatically
When WiFi is connected to CMCC, check for update automatically
Turn on Wi-Fi to start downloading the new software
A new software found for your device. Please connect to a wireless network to download the new software.
Wi-Fi access is not available, Download will be canceled
Already defer 3 times,can not defer any more
"A new software update is available.Do you want to download? %1$s %2$s %3$s"
"A new software found for your device. The data consumption during update process will be charged regarding your data service tariff.Do you want to download? %1$s %2$s %3$s"
"To begin installation,your phone needs to be restarted. Please make sure the battery is at least 10%%. %1$s times to defer is allowed,your phone must be restarted after 3 times delay."
To begin installation,your phone needs to be restarted. Please check the battery or insert the charger to make sure the update successful.
"To begin installation,your phone needs to be restarted. Please make sure the battery is at least 10%%. %1$s times to defer is allowed,your phone must be restarted after 3 times delay."
"To begin installation,your phone needs to be restarted. Please make sure the battery is at least 10%%. Already defer 3 times,your phone will restart in %1$s minutes after click delay button."
Already delay 3 times,your phone will be restarted
WLAN connected now may cause data traffic cost,are you sure to continue?
A software update is available for your device. This update is %1$s in size
and will upgrade your %1$s from version %2$s to %3$s software.

"
Downloading via Wi-Fi is recommended. Downloading may incur additional charges (especially if downloading via a mobile network or while roaming overseas). During download the operation of the device will not be impacted. For more information and help, please visit telstra.com/mobile or contact our Customer Service Centre on 13 2200."

"
Downloading via Wi-Fi is recommended. Downloading may incur additional charges (especially if downloading via a mobile network or while roaming overseas). During download the operation of the device will not be impacted."

The update has been downloaded and is ready to be installed. Click \"Later\" if you do not wish to install the update now. During installation, all device functions will be unavailable, and you will not be able to make emergency calls. The device will restart as part of the installation process. Your data will not be modified or deleted. Before starting installation make sure the battery is charged to at least 30%, and do not unplug the battery during the process.
Check for updates automatically at %1$s on %2$s every second week.
The software update has been successful
There is a new software update for your device.
The connection has changed to mobile network. Downloading has been paused. After WiFi connected again, the downloading will resume.
The connection has changed to mobile network. Downloading has been paused. Continue download?

The connection has changed to mobile network. Downloading is paused. If you want to download under mobile network, please dis-select \"Wifi-Only\" setting and \"Resume Downloading\". Or,Downloading will resume automatically when wifi is OK.
Software updates is not allowed because Wi-Fi is unavailable.

"Wifi-Only is set and present connection is not Wifi. If you want to use mobile net, please dis-select \"Wifi-Only\" and then \"Checking Update\" or \"Resume Downloading\".
To set?"
Last download has been interrupted, Do you want to resume?
"Your phone need to restart to finish installation, so you can't use phone calling including emergency calling during installation."
Make sure battery power more than 30%.
Your phone need to restart to finish installation
Update through network requires data services, so WiFi environment is recommended.
User data will be cleared when update. Please backup your data before update.
Current software is up to date!
Checking Update-Backup Data-Download Data-Prepare Install-Restart Install.
Download will generate data traffic,recommend connect WiFi to download.
You can restore data in setting menu
System updates is not complete,because the package is mismatch.
"System updates is not complete,because the device hasn't enough space."
System updates is not complete,because the package is opened unsuccessfully.
System updates is not complete,because your device is root.
"System updates is not complete,because the package's signature is mismatch."
"System updates is not complete,because the package's time format is mismatch."
System updates is not complete,because the device data space is opened unsuccessfully.
Your device is the latest version.
It will generate data traffic,Please connect Wi-Fi to download.
The update package can be downloaded via Wi-Fi only.
Wi-Fi access is not available, please connect to Wi-Fi to continue downloading.
"Last update time Not yet updated before"
Unable to connect to the network
You will be reminded every 1 hours for 3 times altogether. And this is the %1$s reminder.
You will be reminded every 1 hours for 3 times altogether. And this is the %1$s reminder.Force update in 5 minutes.
You will be reminded every 1 hours for 3 times altogether.
update will be FORCE to launch after %1$s seconds
update will be FORCE to launch after %1$s seconds under WiFi
"ZTE中兴official Tips: More than one million users successfully upgraded, Your phone has %1$s days without updating system ."
"ZTE中兴official Tips: More than one million users successfully upgraded, Thanks for your mobile phone has been upgraded to the latest version."
"You already have a month without updating system ZTE may have released a new system, and quickly went to try it。"
Detect, download, install the system upgrade package.
See detailed history of system upgrades.

"System updates can update the user's system to the latest version.The latest version is officially released by the ZTE,fix some of the problems in the current version.Upgrade the new version,the user can have a better and faster system experience.Upgrade does not uncovered any user personal data,safe and secure.At present,10 million user experience using the System Update.System upgrade will produce a certain flow,the user is carried out under the WIFI network."

When users enter the Check for Update application,click on Check for Updates to initiate updates.If a new upgrade package is available,the user will be prompted to download the upgrade package button,click Download to start the download after the upgrade package.In the download process,if the user does not want to download,can click the Cancel button.After the download is complete,the user is prompted to install,the user can choose install now and also select install later.Choose to install the system into the installation process,the installation is complete,the system update is successfully.

Updates Settings: the user can set up automatic update interval.Feedback: the user in the use of any problems encountered in the process through which the function can be feedback,ZTE will be troublesome to the user to solve.History:Users can check their systems when updated,updated several times.
User canceled during the update process
Network error during the update process
You will be reminded every 1 hours for 3 times altogether. And this is the %1$s reminder. After 3 times defer, download will be cancelled.
You will be reminded every 2 hours.
It will delete downloaded package, and you will download it again when updating next time.
Please restart your device to finish installation,restart now?
"The device will restart to install update,Please don't disconnect the network."
" We suggest you to back up data before updating. You can back up following data:"
The data may be lost due to out of battery, SD card unplugged or other exception conditions, you can recover data by restore menu.
The backup file is not exist,please check whether you have choose backup during system update.
Green-Net mode is on. Updates is aborted. Please exit this mode and update again.

The default interval time is one week and the device will start checking the latest version automatically on time.you can close this functionality with not checked option,but we suggest that it is set to keep the latest version.
The device will start checking the latest version automatically when WiFi open. you can close this functionality with not checked option, but we suggest that it is set to keep the latest version.
You can see some logs for system update,such as download,update and so on.If you want to see more and more logs,Please feedback to us,thank you.
"The SD card is not exist and the backup data can't be done,do you want to download data without backup?"
Copy update package to SD card error. Please make sure the SD card have been inserted correctly and have enough space.
Your feedback is very import,we will do response with you in time...
Please input your smart phone or email...
Send successfully,Thank you for your feedback
Please input the correct email address
The feedback content is not null
You do not currently receive radio conditions are good enough to download your update. Please wait to be in 3G or WiFi and repeat the operation.
The data service is not available,please check connection again
